hadiths.text: Narrated Muhammad bin Seereen:One of the sons of Um 'Atiyya died, and when it was the third day she asked for a yellow perfume and put it over her body, and said, "We were forbidden to mourn for more than three days except for our husbands

chapter.ara-name: باب إِحْدَادِ الْمَرْأَةِ عَلَى غَيْرِ زَوْجِهَا
chapter.eng-name: The mooring of a woman for a dead person other than her husband
